subject: Invitation to Interview for Marketing Manager Role at NovaTech Inc.
body:
Hi Maria,

We appreciated your application for the Marketing Manager position at NovaTech Inc. We would like to invite you to an interview to further discuss your qualifications.

The interview is scheduled for Wednesday, March 20 at 2:00 PM EST and will be conducted via Skype. You will be meeting with Emily Patel, Director of Marketing, who will explore how your skills align with our company's objectives.

Please confirm if this date and time suit you or suggest alternative times that work better for you.

Best regards,
Julian Lee
Recruiting Coordinator
NovaTech Inc.
intent: Invite the candidate to interview and confirm availability
